thread.section_title: Soundstore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Soundstore | www.soundstore.ie
thread.title: Ewa Cierpisz

author: Ewa Cierpisz
title: Ewa Cierpisz
text:
Good price, good contact with the shop and customer service. The only issue I had, was that my parcel wasn't delivered and when I rang to find out whats going on it appeared that it went missing with delivery.
However they have arranged for another parcel to come out immediately and gave me tracking number and I have received the item next day.
Therefore, overall I would recommend Soundstore :)
